feed.title: Little Grand Rapids - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 31 December 2022
